content: this pattern is for two flower bookmarks - a lavender bookmark and a cherry blossom bookmark skill level intermediate finished size about 11 or as you desire yarn patons grace light weight #3 cotton yarn free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-flower-bookmark/ video tutorial for the lavender bookmark https //youtu be/1wxru1rwequ video tutorial for the cherry blossom bookmark https //youtu be/sb1p_ota99s by purchasing a pdf file you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
